Name: Nadeem Khan
AboutMe:
I am a Full-stack web developer with over 5 years of professional experience. I am fiercely passionate about the architecture, user experience, SEO, marketing and interaction of a product, an enthusiast of agile environments, and a web standard advocate.

Over the years, I have worked on core product development, as software consultant and as well as product manager/marketer. With exposure ranging from:

  • Complete LAMP (Linux/Apache/Mysql/Php) stack
  • UI/UX (HTML5, CSS3, Javascript and jQuery)
  • Responsive web design (media queries, Foundation framework and Bootstrap framework)
  • Several MVC based frameworks (including Apache Struts, Sencha Touch 2, Ruby on Rails, CodeIgniter and Zend)
  • Major popular PHP based Content Management Systems (including WordPress and Drupal)
  • Major popular e-commerce platforms (including PHP based WooCommerce and RoR based Spree)
  • Database optimization
  • Cross-platform mobile app development (Javascript based Sencha Touch 2)
  • Consumer Lending/Islamic Financing (Oracle Flexcube/Banking)
  • Data warehousing (Oracle Data Integrator)
  • Blogging
  • SEO/SMO

I continue pursuing a wide spectrum of web and mobile related technologies.
